author: Special Correspondent
text:
A UGC-sponsored national seminar on ‘English for Employability’ will be conducted by the Department of English and Foreign Languages of Bharathiar University here on January 22.

The main focus of the seminar will be bridging the gap between education and employability. Various industry experts will take part in the seminar and explainwhat their expectations are for successful recruitment at various levels of employment.

The seminar will also look to establish the importance of English for better employability. Acclaimed academicians, scholars of English, teachers and soft skills and human resource trainers will participate.

Around 300 delegates, participants and paper presenters are expected to attend the seminar. A conference kit and a participation certificate will be presented to all participants.
